required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Long Term Extension Study of Ixekizumab (LY2439821) in Participants With Axial Spondyloarthritis
clinical_study.official_title: A Multicenter, Long-Term Extension Study of 104 Weeks, Including a Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled 40-Week Randomized Withdrawal-Retreatment Period, to Evaluate the Maintenance of Treatment Effect of Ixekizumab (LY2439821) in Patients With Axial Spondyloarthritis

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate, in participants having achieved a state of sustained remission, if the ixekizumab treatment groups are superior to the placebo group in maintaining response during the randomized withdrawal-retreatment period in participants with axial spondyloarthritis.

primary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants who do not Experience a Flare (Combined Ixekizumab Treatment)
primary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants who do not experience a flare

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Modified Stoke Ankylosing Spondylitis Spinal Score (mSASSS)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in mSASSS

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Achieving an Assessment of Spondyloarthritis International Society (ASAS)20 Response
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants achieving an ASAS20 response

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Achieving an ASAS40 Response
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants achieving an ASAS40 response

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants with Change of Ankylosing Spondylitis Disease Activity Score (ASDAS) ≥1.1 Units
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants with change of ASDAS ≥1.1 units

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants with Inactive Disease on the ASDAS (<1.3 Units)
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants with inactive disease on the ASDAS (<1.3 units)

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in the Individual Components of the ASAS Criteria
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in the individual components of the ASAS criteria

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants Achieving Bath Ankylosing Spondylitis Disease Activity Index 50 (BASDAI50) Response
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants achieving BASDAI50 response

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in the Measure of High Sensitivity C-Reactive Protein (CRP)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in the measure of high sensitivity CRP

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Bath Ankylosing Spondylitis Functional Index (BASFI)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in BASFI

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Bath Ankylosing Spondylitis Metrology Index (BASMI)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in BASMI

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Chest Expansion in Centimeters
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in chest expansion in centimeters

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Occiput to Wall Distance
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in occiput to wall distance

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Maastricht Ankylosing Spondylitis Enthesitis Score (MASES)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in MASES

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Spondyloarthritis Research Consortium of Canada (SPARCC) Enthesitis Score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in SPARCC enthesitis score

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Severity of Peripheral Arthritis by Tender Joint Count (TJC) Score of 46/44 Joints
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in severity of peripheral arthritis by TJC score of 46/44 joints

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Severity of Peripheral Arthritis by Swollen Joint Count (SJC) Score of 46/44 Joints
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in severity of peripheral arthritis by SJC score of 46/44 joints

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants with Anterior Uveitis or Uveitis Flares
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants with anterior uveitis or uveitis flares

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in the Fatigue Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) Score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in the Fatigue NRS score

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the Quick Inventory of Depressive Symptomatology Self-Report-16 (QIDS-SR16)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline on the QIDS-SR16

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in 36-Item Short Form Health Survey (SF-36) Physical Component Summary (PCS) Score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in SF-36 PCS score

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in SF-36 Mental Component Summary (MCS) Score
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in SF-36 MCS score

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in ASAS-Health Index (ASAS-HI)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in ASAS-HI

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline on the European Quality of Life - 5 Dimensions 5 Level (EQ-5D-5L)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline on the EQ-5D-5L

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in the Work Productivity Activity Impairment Spondyloarthritis (WPAI-SpA) Scores
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in the WPAI-SpA scores

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in the Jenkins Sleep Evaluation Questionnaire (JSEQ)
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in the JSEQ

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of Participants with No New Syndesmophyte Formation
secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of participants with no new syndesmophyte formation

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Anti-Ixekizumab Antibodies
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with anti-ixekizumab antibodies

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Have completed the final study visit in Study RHBV (NCT02696785), RHBW (NCT02696798), or RHBX (NCT02757352).
(Note: Participants from Study RHBX are not eligible if they permanently discontinued ixekizumab and were receiving a tumor necrosis factor [TNF] inhibitor).
- Must agree to use a reliable method of birth control.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Have significant uncontrolled disorders or abnormal laboratory values that, in the opinion of the investigator, pose an unacceptable risk to the participant if investigational product continues to be administered.
- Have a known hypersensitivity to ixekizumab or any component of this investigational product.
- Had investigational product permanently discontinued during a previous ixekizumab study.
- Had temporary investigational product interruption at any time during or at the final study visit of a previous ixekizumab study and, in the opinion of the investigator, restarting ixekizumab poses an unacceptable risk for the participant's participation in the study.
- Have any other condition that, in the opinion of the investigator, renders the participant unable to understand the nature, scope, and possible consequences of the study or precludes the participant from following and completing the protocol.
- Are currently enrolled in any other clinical trial involving an investigational product or any other type of medical research judged not to be scientifically or medically compatible with this study.

link.description: A Long Term Extension Study of Ixekizumab (LY2439821) in Participants With Axial Spondyloarthritis (COAST-Y)

patient_data.ipd_description: Lilly provides access to the individual patient data from studies on approved medicines and indications as defined by the sponsor specific information on ClinicalStudyDataRequest.com. This access is provided in a timely fashion after the primary publication is accepted. Researchers need to have an approved research proposal submitted through ClinicalStudyDataRequest.com. Access to the data will be provided in a secure data sharing environment after signing a data sharing agreement.
